dcterms:creator: M. Wunder
M. Littman
M. Babes
dcterms:description: A variation of the well-known Matching Pennies game, which is a 2-agent, weighted zero-sum game with two actions {H, T}. Each agent has a unique interior Nash equilibrium.
dcterms:title: Asymmetric Matching Pennies (AMPs)

dcterms:creator: M. Wunder
M. Littman
M. Babes
dcterms:description: A symmetric zero-sum game with three actions for each player, where the payoffs are structured such that each action can defeat another.
dcterms:title: Rock-Paper-Scissors (RPS)

dcterms:creator: Y. Cai
O. Candogan
C. Daskalakis
C. Papadimitriou
dcterms:description: A generalization of minmax, focusing on zero-sum polymatrix games which involve multiple agents and complex interactions.
dcterms:title: Zero-Sum Polymatrix Game (ZSPG)
